humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: Based on the information provided in the pathology report, there is no evidence of metastatic carcinoma in the sentinel lymph nodes or regional lymph nodes for both the right and left breasts. In the right breast, the report mentions 'NO TUMOR SEEN' in all four sentinel lymph nodes (0/4). Similarly, in the left breast, there is no tumor seen in the two sentinel lymph nodes (0/2) and one intramammary lymph node. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0, as per New Rules 10 and 11.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The report states that there is no tumor seen in any of the sentinel lymph nodes from both the right and left axilla. In the AJCC cancer staging manual, N0 indicates no regional lymph node metastasis. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N0.
